name: Piyotama
description:
Hidden deep within the Hotai forest, you’ll find a family of playful and mysteriously colored creatures known as Piyos. Every spring Mother Piyo “PIYOMAMA” lays a few eggs to fill the forest with new colorful Piyos; however, this year she got too excited and laid too many eggs! Help her hatch the eggs before they overflow the nest!

Simply line ‘em up, chain ‘em and combo hatch: it’s an excitingly addictive action-puzzle game. Easy to learn and hard to quit!

KEY FEATURES
•Fast & Fun Gameplay – Easy pick up & play, solo or against a friend. Match 4 or more eggs of the same color to hatch piyos & hatch the rare egg to complete each level.
•Infinite Levels - Enjoy colorful characters, carnival music, & playful scenery in full HD at 1080p. Test your skills in timed play or timer-free.
•SIXAXIS™ Wireless Controller- nudge controller side to side to fill in gaps, & shake up and down to force matched eggs to warm & hatch instantly.
•Global Online Ranking -perch your hatching skills worldwide.

Video output in HD requires cables and an HD-compatible display, both sold separately. This game supports displays ranging from standard definition to 1080p displays.
